channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-23351|2024-05-06T14:32:20.807Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption as GPU registers beyond the last protected range can be accessed through LPAC submissions.

item.title: CVE-2024-23354|2024-05-06T14:32:22.111Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when the IOCTL call is interrupted by a signal.

item.title: CVE-2024-21474|2024-05-06T14:32:14.501Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when size of buffer from previous call is used without validation or re-initialization.

item.title: CVE-2024-21454|2024-04-12T08:39:03.871Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while decoding the ToBeSignedMessage in Automotive Telematics.

item.title: CVE-2024-21480|2024-05-06T14:32:19.583Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption while playing audio file having large-sized input buffer.

item.title: CVE-2024-21475|2024-05-06T14:32:15.988Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when the payload received from firmware is not as per the expected protocol size.

item.description: Memory corruption while processing Codec2 during v13k decoder pitch synthesis.

item.description: Transient DOS while decoding an ASN.1 OER message containing a SEQUENCE of unknown extensions.

item.description: Memory corruption when there is failed unmap operation in GPU.

item.description: Memory corruption in Kernel while handling GPU operations.

item.description: Memory corruption while redirecting log file to any file location with any file name.

item.title: CVE-2024-21453|2024-04-12T08:39:02.719Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while decoding message of size that exceeds the available system memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-21470|2024-04-12T08:39:07.646Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption while allocating memory for graphics.

item.title: CVE-2024-21471|2024-05-06T14:32:13.229Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon

item.description: Memory corruption when the channel ID passed by user is not validated and further used.

item.title: CVE-2024-21477|2024-05-06T14:32:18.401Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing a protected 802.11az Fine Time Measurement (FTM) frame.

item.title: CVE-2023-43544|2024-06-03T10:05:18.375Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when IPC callback handle is used after it has been released during register callback by another thread.

item.title: CVE-2023-43545|2024-06-03T10:05:19.696Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when more scan frequency list or channels are sent from the user space.

item.description: Information disclosure while handling T2LM Action Frame in WLAN Host.

item.description: Transient DOS while processing an improperly formatted Fine Time Measurement (FTM) management frame.

item.title: CVE-2023-43551|2024-06-03T10:05:21.301Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Cryptographic issue while performing attach with a LTE network, a rogue base station can skip the authentication phase and immediately send the Security Mode Command.
